modName: V740T_Engraved bottles of potions and poisons
summary:
Engraved bottles of potions and poisons.
New colors and saturation bottles, improved quality, engraved surface, improved gloss.
descriptionHtml:
Hi all :)

NEW of this modification options! --  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35413
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tried to give a set of new appearances on bottles of potions and poisons in the game, I wanted to make it look more \"sweet\" on store shelves.
Was up to, and probably do not fail .... I think now they look more \"majestic and sweet\" - Have fun;)
New colors and saturation bottles, improved quality, engraved surface, improved gloss.

MY OTHER MODS

NEW HD textures for INTERFACE and sounds --------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27980
NEW era for PLANTS ---------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28212
NEW textures for grass ------------------ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28119
NEW ERA Iron Weapons (Tealistic retex) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28059
Sounds effects and Music for SKYRIM --- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27447
NEW textures for Caves ------------------ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768
NEW textures for mountains -------------http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27999
